Name: AutomaticOSUpgradePolicy
SummaryComment: The configuration parameters used for performing automatic OS upgrade.

Key.Name: DisableAutomaticRollback
Key.SummaryComment: Whether OS image rollback feature should be disabled

Key.Name: EnableAutomaticOSUpgrade
Key.SummaryComment:
Indicates whether OS upgrades should automatically be applied to scale set instances in a rolling fashion when a newer version of the OS image becomes available.

If this is set to true for Windows based pools, [WindowsConfiguration.enableAutomaticUpdates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/batchservice/pool/add?tabs=HTTP#windowsconfiguration) cannot be set to true.

Key.Name: UseRollingUpgradePolicy
Key.SummaryComment: Indicates whether rolling upgrade policy should be used during Auto OS Upgrade. Auto OS Upgrade will fallback to the default policy if no policy is defined on the VMSS.

Key.Name: OsRollingUpgradeDeferral
Key.SummaryComment: Defer OS upgrades on the TVMs if they are running tasks.
